price: Kahit pa man sila dati bago pa ibinaba ito sa kanila, bago pa nito, ay talagang mga nalulumbay.
arabic: وَإِن كَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يُنَزَّلَ عَلَيۡهِم مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ لَمُبۡلِسِينَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-in kānū min qabli an yunazzala ʿalayhim min qablihi lamub'lisīna
